sentence: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich released an interim report Wednesday on the 2020 election in Maricopa County, concluding that fraud did occur and uncovering serious issues concerning the handling of over 100,000 mail-in ballots.
author: Randy DeSoto
title: AZ AG Releases Report Finding 'Fraud' and Problems with Handling of Over 100K Mail-in Ballots in Maricopa County
